title: Vern’s and Sons Food Service Recalls Beef and Chicken Products Produced Without Benefit of Inspection
summary: WASHINGTON, April 8, 2015 Verns and Sons Food Service, a Milwaukie, Ore. establishment, is recalling approximately 450 pounds of beef and chicken products that were produced without the benefit of federal inspection and outside inspection hours, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection...
